name: Wrong Turf
description:
Wrong turf is a horde/wave game where the player must defend themselves against ever increasing amounts of enemies and try to get the high score before they are killed.

How To Install

Simply download the game from the link below and unzip it. Then launch it by clicking the file name Comp2007Street 

Controls

Movement - W,S

Shoot - Left Click

Aim - Mouse

Pause - Escape

The Game can be downloaded via the zip file above for Windows PCs.

The game was made using the Unity Engine.

Gunsounds and Skybox were obtained from free sources, found in the readme file.

Music also obtained from a free uncopyrighted source.
